EmailTemplate.description: Template to send as a follow up to a voice mail.
EmailTemplate.name: OTR Field Sales Call Out Intro - VM
EmailTemplate.subject: Per my voice mail - WEX Fleet One
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
My name is {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} with WEX Fleet One.
Per my voice mail, I not only wanted to introduce myself, but also make certain you were aware of everything WEX Fleet One can can offer you to manage your company's vehicles.
Factoring – Accelerated Cash Flow, Powerful Real-Time Reporting, Fuel Card Funding and Flexible Pricing Structure with no hidden fees.
WEX Fuel Management – Applications designed exclusively for wherever you are in the fuel supply chain. These tailored offerings address industry-specific needs to help companies optimize fuel purchases and processes, and adapt quickly to changing market demands.
Permits - Purchase the necessary temporary permits your drivers need including Trip, Fuel, and Oversize/Overweight.
Telematics – An easy-to-use fleet vehicle tracking solution that helps you monitor fuel use and driver behavior - anytime, anywhere.
Cash Services – Cash Advances. ATM access. PlusChek® Services. And more.
Have vehicles in your fleet with less than 18 wheels? WEX Fleet One has got you covered. We offer feature-packed savings for your gasoline vehicles too!
I'll be reaching out to you again in the coming weeks to see what we can do for you. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!Opportunity.OwnerPhone} or via email at {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}.
I look forward to speaking to you in the near future.
Sincerely,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
{!Opportunity.OwnerTitle}
{!Opportunity.OwnerPhone}
